subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{der|zh|sit-pro|-}}. {{doublet|zh}} of {{zh-l|福|blessing}}.

Cognate with {{cog|bo|ཕྱུག}}, {{m|bo|ཕྱུག་པོ||rich, wealthy}}, {{m|bo|ཕྱུགས||all beasts that can be domesticated or subjugated by man; cattle}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[abundant]]; [[ample]]
# [[rich]]; [[wealthy]]
# [[wealth]]
# to make rich; to make wealthy
# {{surname|lang=zh|dot=:}} [[Fu]]
